alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 4:28PM CDT until March 26 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rapides Parish in central Louisiana... Northwestern Avoyelles Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 428 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alexandria, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Kingsville, Deville, Libuse, Esler Regional Airport, Kolin, Centerpoint and Holloway. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 78 and 87. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central Louisiana.
